articles.author: Sophie Kiderlin
articles.title: European Union in limbo as Washington keeps it waiting on a trade agreement - CNBC
articles.description: The transatlantic trading partners could however reach a framework deal as soon as this week.
articles.content:
The European Union (EU) is stuck in limbo as uncertainty persists around when a trade agreement with the U.S. might be reached.
The goal had been to agree on a framework by July 9, when a temporary … [+3252 chars]

articles.title: Elusive romance of top-quark pairs observed at the LHC - Home | CERN
articles.description: An unforeseen feature in proton-proton collisions previously observed by the CMS experiment at CERN’s Large Hadron Collider (LHC) has now been confirmed by its sister experiment ATLAS. The result, reported yesterday at the European Physical Society’s High-Ene…
articles.content: The CMS and ATLAS experiments at CERNs Large Hadron Collider have observed an unforeseen feature in the behaviour of top quarks that suggests that these heaviest of all elementary particles form a fl… [+5834 chars]
